review: I bought during Black Friday and It has met my expectations with the cost of $25.  I have been having trouble with the remote so I have been forced to use the app from the phone.  I didn't renew my subscription to Prime because of the prince increase and the lack of content...I was happy to see the videos I purchased were still in my library. I plan on buying the Chromecast to compare.
author: narose "nar9311"

review: Picked this up on the $20 Prime member special when it was first announced. Great for the price. Like the Roku 2 & 3 more - primarily better interface and search. This is nice for the size and portability. I have no experience with the similar Google Chromecast or Roku sticks so can't do an apples to apples comparison with those.
author: Doug

review: I really like this compared to my Roku and Samsung smart TV. It is much more responsive when you change of look for apps. My favorite is the selection of nature, fireplace, and snowfall apps. They are better than the Blu-rays I have. Also if you use the radio app, instead of displaying the radio station logo it does a slide show of beautiful pictures. I am hoping  to see more and more apps such as Drama Fever. For a tiny stick that plugs into your HDMI port, this thing rocks.
author: Lance

review: Easy to install and use. Streams all the things. This is my first Amazon device. I recommend if you have Amazon prime and Hulu or Netflix
author: Martinez

review: loving it but wifi just a little buggy with Plex other apps fine.
author: Green Monkey

review: Got mine a bit earlier than expected with the pricing from being a prime member. So far so good. I do wish the power plug was on the end like the roku stick, but it works. Also, noticeably faster to startup compared to the roku stick. I gave that one up for this and it seems like a good trade. I'm just waiting for HBO2GO on this and I'll be set.
author: haruman "haruman"

review: The Fire stick was easy enough to set up. It took several attempts to connect to my wifi. You will definitely want to use the ac power cord or the Fire stick will fire up each time you turn the tv on. The remote is easy to use and the program is simple to maneuver through. So far, I love it!
author: Kristen Coble

review: Works great! I have a Google chrome and like the fire stick more. It's faster and easy to navigate. Will be buying another for basement tv.
